title: 求助！求解读崩溃报告
author: BAyunzi2
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 15-4-5 下午1:12
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at com.flansmod.common.teams.TeamsManager.tick(TeamsManager.java:148)
        at com.flansmod.common.CommonTickHandler.tick(CommonTickHandler.java:48)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler_16_CommonTickHandler_tick_ServerTickEvent.invoke(.dynamic)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:51)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:122)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPostServerTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:247)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:834)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:646)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.2
        Operating System: Linux (amd64) version 2.6.32-504.el6.x86_64
        Java Version: 1.7.0_76, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 700620944 bytes (668 MB) / 2136535040 bytes (2037 MB) up to 8432910336 bytes (8042 MB)
        JVM Flags: 3 total; -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -Xmx8192M -XX:MaxPermSize=128M
        AABB Pool Size: 13626 (763056 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 2000 (112000 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 12, tallocated: 94
        FML: MCP v9.03 FML v7.2.217.1147 Minecraft Forge 10.12.2.1147 14 mods loaded, 14 mods active
        mcp{9.03} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        FML{7.2.217.1147} [Forge Mod Loader] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2x.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        Forge{10.12.2.1147} [Minecraft Forge] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2x.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        flammpfeil.slashblade{mc1.7.10-r42} [SlashBlade] (SlashBlade-mc1.7.10-r42.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        flammpfeil.fluorescentbar{mc1.7.2-r3} [fluorescentbar] (-fluorescentbar-mc1.7.2-r3.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        BambooMod{Minecraft1.7.2 ver2.6.5.1} [BambooMod] (Bamboo 1.7.2 - 2.6.5.1.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        flammpfeil.slashblade.blademaster{mc1.7.2-r1} [BladeMaster] (BladeMaster-mc1.7.2-r1.2.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available

        GraviSuite{1.7.2-1.9.9c} [Graviation Suite] (GraviSuite-1.7.2-1.9.9c[TFCＮ].jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        flammpfeil.nihil{mc1.7.x-r6} [Nihil] (Nihil-mc1.7.x-r6.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available

一天崩15次  我已经忍不住了 玩家都走光了  求解决办法  
ps：30金粒是我全身所有的钱

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: flan‘s mod 错误，mod内的队伍功能挂了

replies.author: 學委
replies.txt_content:
如果楼主是因为添加了MOD导致的该原因，请自行删除mod重启并在控制台输入/fml confirm.
第二种可能是楼主服务器内部分玩家使用了导致服务器崩服的物品故意而为。楼主清除所有玩家，自行进入服务器，若没崩，则为上述。
